markdownRemark.html:
Check Date

Works on 2019-03-11 11:45:51+0800

Question

How to exclude one word with grep command ?

Answer

use flag -v

cat some-file | grep -v 'some-word' > result.txt

Reference

  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4538253/how-can-i-exclude-one-word-with-grep

frontmatter.title: How to exclude one word with grep
